snippet.title: Ultra Hyperball Launch Trailer (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
The epic sport from the future, TODAY!

Get together an play with up to 4 players in this frantic party game available exclusively for the Nintendo switch!

Play through the game;s single player story mode, and discover the secrets to the world of Hyperball!

Making full use of the Switch, play with Joycons, Touch controls and motion controls throughout a host of varied and fun gameplay modes!
